title: Comfort Zones Kill Calling
verse_text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
insight: God doesn’t call us into easy chairs; He calls us into battlefields. In Joshua 1:9, we are reminded that strength and courage grow outside comfort zones.
Growth never lives in comfort. Every great story of faith starts with risk - stepping into the unknown with God. Courage is not the absence of fear; it’s moving forward despite it.
one_minute_win: Do one small thing today that scares you but grows you.
declaration: I was made for courage, not comfort.
